definitions.definition: A social system in which the father is head of the household , having authority over women and children , and in which lineage is traced through the male line.
A power structure in which men are dominant .
The office of a patriarch ; a patriarchate .

main_definition: ( anthropology , history ) A social system in which the father is head of the household , having authority over women and children , and in which lineage is traced through the male line.
secondary_definitions: A power structure in which men are dominant .
( Christianity ) The office of a patriarch ; a patriarchate .
